title: TIGA Model-Based English Digital Learning Platform for Thai Middle School Students

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Digital learning environments tailored to Thailand’s public education system, with limited technological infrastructure centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can comprehend English texts related to daily life with 80% accuracy by utilizing the TIGA model framework (Task, Input, Genre, Assessment).
Learners perform peer evaluations and feedback exchanges through collaborative tools in digital platforms with over 90% consistency.
Learners enhance self-directed learning skills by completing three or more writing tasks at the CEFR A2–B1 level.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
